ground.answer: It should copy the above text with no loss

info.description: Tests how good the agent is at closely following the goals that it's given.

name: Write6Files
task: Follow these exact instructions. Create 6 files txt files. 2 of them should say 'Hello World', 2 should say 'Yum!' and the last 2 should say 'Good weather huh?'
